body:
Hi everyone :)



I get really weird radiation analysis results and I don't understand why... I tried switching to a different epw, cancelled the "type hint" options on all the components (which seemed to be the problem last time), checked the srf dir, switched surfaces (made a new surface and inserted it into GH)... didn't work. 

When I connect a different polysurface from the same Rhino model it does work. Any ideas?

replies.body:
Hi Adi, Could you share your file again? The geometries seem to be empty. Thanks.
Antonello

Hi Adi, your file works fine, [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/PdXXQXB083X7nddcPVVd7LHc1-8-Dr1mxYXmqN06FKsMDuEvRtRxEEKlOH-bzOoiUeVUSoW9D5ak*ozM-gMbF4x*n4i4rM4d/check_.png) Could you connect a panel like in the image above? Best Antonello
strange... the sky matrix seems fine, but if I connect a panel to the analysis OUT, it gives an error.
What are the units of your model is set to? If you don't know type units in Rhino command line and press Enter.
